item.title: Sirikit, Glamorous Former Queen of Thailand Who Wielded Power, Dies at 93
item.description: As the wife of King Bhumibol Adulyadej, she traveled the world charming government leaders and the public.

item.title: Trump Administration Plans a Shake-Up at ICE to Speed Deportations
item.description: The preliminary plan stems from frustration over the pace of the deportations, which are lagging behind President Trump’s demands.

item.title: U.S. Details How Mob and Ex-NBA Players Lured High Rollers Into Poker Trap
item.description: A Manhattan apartment was at the center of a Mafia-run ring that used former N.B.A. players as bait and technology to read cards, prosecutors say.

item.title: Bannon Claims ‘There Is a Plan’ for Trump to Run for a Third Term
item.description: The claim comes after months of President Trump toying with the idea, insisting that he is “not joking” about defying a constitutionally-mandated term...

item.title: Mamdani Says Rivals Are Pushing Hate as Mayor’s Race Enters Last Stretch
item.description: Zohran Mamdani’s opponents, Andrew Cuomo and Curtis Sliwa, denied accusations that they are stoking Islamophobia with their rhetoric and actions.
